title: House of Lost Daisies
description: Perrie and her best friend Derek thought they were going to be spending a nice, relaxing weekend camping in the Glen; relishing their final summer days before starting Senior Year. However, a wrong turn leaves them at the mercy of an old house along the side of Route 52. The house looks abandoned, but are there dark secrets hidden inside? Perrie and Derek will have to put aside their fears and insecurities and fight for their freedom as they learn that things aren't always as they seem.Show more
author: Megan Weiss
